p: Factors determining the activity of the EO are the composition functional groups present in the active components ( Dorman and Deans, 2000) and the encapsulation method. The main compounds identified in M. verticillata EO were oxygenated terpenes. Previous studies state that oxygenated terpenes exhibit better antimicrobial activity than hydrocarbons ( Guimarães et al., 2019) maybe through the inhibition of essential processes to microbial survival and alterations in the lipid membrane function ( Mahizan et al., 2019; Cano et al., 2008).
